definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: Fortunately, the fire is discovered soon after it has started.
sentences.chinese: 幸好火勢剛起就立即被發現了。

sentences.english: Luckily the strength of the piece did not depend upon him.
sentences.chinese: 幸好這齣戲並不靠他來撐場面。

sentences.english: Iraq shares a table, before is always bullied by Iraq, has class leader to support luckily.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克同桌，以前老被伊拉克欺負，幸好有班長撐腰。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the Mid-Autumn Festival is no class, so the sleep time.
sentences.chinese: 幸好中秋節不用上課，於是有了補眠的時候。

sentences.english: Happily a good rain followed, turning the maize leaves green again.
sentences.chinese: 幸好接着下了一場好雨，使玉米葉子又返青了。

sentences.english: However, Doc reveals he was wearing a bulletproof vest after reading the letter.
sentences.chinese: 幸好博士因爲讀過馬蒂的信，事先穿了一件防彈服。

sentences.english: Luckily there was a taxi stand nearby.
sentences.chinese: 幸好附近就有一個出租車候客處。

sentences.english: Luckily, half-meter snow drifts on the road are sometimes cleaned up by bulldozers…
sentences.chinese: 幸好，有時候推土機會把積得半米高的雪推掉。

sentences.english: Fortunately the thunderstorm kept off until we were safely indoors.
sentences.chinese: 幸好我們已經安全地回到家裏雷暴雨纔來到。

sentences.english: Luckily our cellar was still full of potatoes, so we lived on potatoes with salt.
sentences.chinese: 幸好地窖裏存滿了馬鈴薯，於是我們以鹽焗土豆爲食。

sentences.english: Luckily, Jerry was found relatively quickly and rushed to the local trauma center.
sentences.chinese: 幸好，傑利及時發現送往當地的急救中心。

sentences.english: Luckily her mother Kelly was waiting outside with a cab ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 幸好她母親叫好出租車等在外面隨時準備出發。

sentences.english: Fortunately, she has decided to continue pursuing Taekwondo.
sentences.chinese: 幸好，她最後還是決定繼續這條跆拳路。

sentences.english: Fortunately there are several introduction-to-Wicket articles and other guides on-line.
sentences.chinese: 幸好網絡上有一些Wicket的介紹文章和指南。

sentences.english: I only felt much better after daddy gave me some dried cherries.
sentences.chinese: 幸好爸爸給了我一點車釐子乾，感覺好很多了。

sentences.english: Perhaps he should have said fortunately short.
sentences.chinese: 或許他應該說，幸好是短暫的。

definition: if it were not for/but for
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
to have a close call/to have a narrow escape
